name: crysalicss
description: A component library template for CSS code

scripts.build-and-reload: npm run source && npm run metalsmith && ./node_modules/browser-sync/dist/bin.js reload
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run source && npm run sass && npm run js && npm run metalsmith
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./build || true rm -rf ./source || true && mkdir ./source && mkdir -p ./source/css || true && mkdir -p ./source/js || true  && mkdir -p ./source/img || true
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others 'npm run watch-css' 'npm run watch-js' 'npm run watch-http' 'npm run watch-html'
scripts.sass: ./node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass ./sass/import.scss source/css/metalsmith.css && postcss --use autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 5%' -o source/css/metalsmith.css source/css/metalsmith.css && cleancss -o source/css/metalsmith.css source/css/metalsmith.css
scripts.source: npm run source-assets && npm run source-posts && npm run source-styles && npm run vendor-css && mkdir -p ./build
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others 'npm run watch-css' 'npm run watch-js' 'npm run watch-html'

author: Vittorio Vittori
